metadata.synopsis: A slaver (Warren Oates) buys Drum (Ken Norton), a bordello queen's (Silvia Pinal) son, in 1860s New Orleans.

reviews: A hopelessly inept, foul interpretation of history and human emotions that should be ignored at all costs.
The movie is nothing more than a soap opera set in New Orleans. [Full Review in Spanish]
Trashy and bloodier sequel to Mandingo (1975).
